FAQ.title: Frequently asked
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the product and billing.
FAQ.question1: Is there a free trial available?
FAQ.answer1: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for all new users. No credit card required to start. You'll have full access to all features during the trial period.
FAQ.question2: How do I update my billing information?
FAQ.answer2: You can update your billing info in Account Settings. Go to Billing > Payment Method. We support updates for VAT certificates and company details.
FAQ.question3: What payment methods do you accept?
FAQ.answer3: We accept Mada, Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and bank transfers for annual plans. All payments are processed securely.
FAQ.answer4: Yes, all our invoices are fully compliant with Saudi ZATCA e-invoicing regulations (Phase 1 & 2).
